loadOFMatchFromPacket(IOFSwitch, byte[], short) - Method in class etri.sdn.controller.protocol.OFProtocol
Create an OFMatch object from the packet-in data.
loadOFMatchFromString(IOFSwitch, String) - Method in class etri.sdn.controller.protocol.OFProtocol
Set this OFMatch's parameters based on a comma-separated key=value pair dpctl-style string, e.g., from the output of OFMatch.toString()

Supported keys/values include

KEY(s) VALUE "in_port","input_port" integer "dl_src","eth_src", "dl_dst","eth_dst" hex-string "dl_type", "dl_vlan", "dl_vlan_pcp" integer "nw_src", "nw_dst", "ip_src", "ip_dst" CIDR-style netmask "tp_src","tp_dst" integer (max 64k)
The CIDR-style netmasks assume 32 netmask if none given, so: "128.8.128.118/32" is the same as "128.8.128.118"
